titlestmt.titleproper: Edgar W. Smith Photograph Albums circa 1910-1956.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by MarcEdit

publicationstmt.publisher: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

physdesc.extent: .5 cubic feet (376 photographs and postcards in 2 albums)

did.abstract: 376 black and white photographs and color postcards, with ephemeral material, ca. 1910-1956.

scopecontent.p: 376 black and white photographs and color postcards, with ephemeral material, ca. 1910-1956. Album 610 regards a Mediterranean cruise taken by Smith on the S. S. Constitution in 1956. Includes postcards from various tourist destinations in the Mediterranean, and photographs of activities aboard the ship; Album 611 contains images of the Pacific NW Wheat and Cattle, Joint Civilian Orientation Conference, wherein approximately 80 prominent civilian leaders (including Smith) toured Marine, Naval, Air Force and Army installations to observe the nation's combat readiness, including West point Academy.

accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library before any reproduction use. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all of the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright owners.

prefercite.p: Edgar W. Smith Photograph Albums, Org. Lot 1187, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.
